dmca.title: Notice of Action under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act
dmca.body:
Dear Comcast High-Speed Internet Subscriber:

Comcast has received a notification of claimed infringement made under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act (the 'DMCA'). This notification, made by a copyright owner or its authorized agent, reports an alleged infringement of one or more copyrighted works made on or over Comcast's High-Speed Interent service (the 'Service'). The works identified in the notification of claimed infringment are listed below. In accordance with the DMCA and Comcast's Acceptable Use Policy, Comcast request that you immediately remove the allegedly inbfringing works from the Service or Comcast will be forced to remove or block access to the works. 

If you believe in good faith that the allegedly infringing works have been removed or blocked by mistake or misidentification, then you may send a counter notification to Comcast. Upon Comcast's receipt of a counter notification that satisfies the requirements of the DMCA, Comcast will provide a copy of the counter notification to the party who sent the original notification of claimed infringement. We will then follow the DMCA's procedures with respect to a received counter notification. 

Fore more information regarding Comcast's copyright infringement policy, procedures, and contact information, please read our Acceptance Use Policy by clicking on the Terms of Service link at http://www.comcast.net.

Sincerely, 

Comcast Network Abuse and Observance Team
